Text.val: temporary event to delete local data (in case they were synced before. This is required since the data is generated randomally
on the server, so if the local data is not deleted, it will show data from old syncs
Usually this event will be raised in the main program (with Wait=No) so that it will be done on startup.
The next line copies all the images from the images folder on the server to the client. (Only modified images are downloaded)
The next line calls a Server To Client synchronization manager program to sync data from the server to the client.
Similar program can be used to copy data from the client to the server.

ExpSyntax.val: 'DS01_ How Do I Synchronize data and files?'
